title: Game freezes my entire computer
body:
Here are my specs: 
CPU: AMD FX-6300
RAM: Ripjaws 8gig ddr3 
GPU: AMD Radeon R9 380x
MB: MSI 970A-G46
HD: Seagate 3TB HDD
Windows 10 (64bit)

I will get into a game. It can be 1 minute or 30 minutes in and the game completely freezes my computer. Whatever was last on screen is now stuck there accompanied by a horrible buzzing noise coming from the speakers that sounds like a piece from a dubstep song. I have to hold down the power button in order to fix it. First started happening about 2 months ago and I have been troubleshooting ever since.

So far, I have reinstalled the LoL, reinstalled my drivers, reinstalled (reset) windows, and even (for unrelated reasons) completely wiped the HDD and then reinstalled everything. 

Not sure what else I can do. This happens regardless of the type of game ARAM to Ranked (which I stopped playing once the problem presented itself). 

Any suggestions on fixing it?

replies.body: Same and i have the same processor

It really sounds like your entire pc is freezing up, which may not be happening from League actually. There's a new-ish feature in Windows called the XBox Game Bar which we've noticed have caused these crashes from time to time. Let's try [**disabling the Game Bar**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and testing it in a custom or practice game for a few minutes, but hit me back if that doesn't help.

It is definitely. League. it's only happens when league is open
And I already disabled that a while ago.

Double check that it wasn't turned back on after some of the recent Windows updates, as other players have noticed that it can sometimes turn itself back on randomly. 

If that Game Bar is still turned off, reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can look over some of your game logs for a little more context as to what's going on. You can generate those logs for us by using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).
It is definitely. League. it's only happens when league is open
Also, none of my components are getting over 50 C.
